issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
I was unable to download files/document in webview from page that remote web site URL?

Example:
    <Alloy>
        <Window class="container">
            <WebView url="http://sakai.vidyayug.com:9080/portal"></WebView> 
        </Window>
    </Alloy>

Expected:
    Files/Documents should be download.
    
Can any one help me out, To download the documents/files in webview from page that remote web site url.
fields.summary: unable to download files/document in WebView from page that remote web site URL
fields.environment:
*My Environments:*

Operating System    = Windows 10
Node.js Version = 4.6.0
npm Version = 2.15.9
Titanium CLI Version = 5.0.14
Titanium SDK Version = 6.3.0.GA

comments.body:
Hello, Thanks for sharing with us.See guide on file download using httpclient: http://docs.appcelerator.com/platform/latest/#!/guide/File_Uploads_and_Downloads
Hope this helps.

Thanks.

Hi Sharif AbuDarda, Thanks for your reply. Actually my requirement is, I am rendering my remote web site url in titanium webview. but some pages having File Name tags. I want to download those files in mobile.

Hello [~chanakya].

I would like to inform you that this not possible to download files in a WebView.

Thanks
